title: Calories in 6 oz Blackberries
meta_description: Discover calories in 6 oz blackberries: about 73 kcal total, with high fiber, low fat, and full nutrition details plus tweaks for recipes.
assumptions: Fresh, raw blackberries; whole, washed berries; average ripeness.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by variety, ripeness, growing conditions, and storage; check labels for packaged products.

quick_answer.text: 6 oz fresh blackberries provide ~73 kcal, 9 g fiber, and 2.4 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp granulated sugar per 100 g
Use dried blackberries instead of fresh per 100 g
Canned in light syrup, drained, per 100 g

faqs.q: How many calories in 6 oz blackberries?
faqs.a: About 73 calories for 6 oz fresh blackberries.

faqs.q: What is the fiber in 6 oz blackberries?
faqs.a: Approximately 9 g of dietary fiber, aiding digestion.

faqs.q: Are 6 oz blackberries low in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, around 8.3 g natural sugars, mostly from the fruit.

faqs.q: How much protein in 6 oz blackberries?
faqs.a: About 2.4 g protein, a modest amount for a fruit serving.
A cup (about 5.5 oz or 144 g) has roughly 62 calories.
